forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of dense morning fog. Sunny. High 17C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of dense morning fog. Sunny. High 61F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 17C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 62F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 57F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 16C. E winds shifting to SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 59F. E winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 19C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 65F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 61F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 19C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 65F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
